copy: American production designer and creative director best known for long-running work for ABC News and ABC Daytime, including LED-forward, video-as-scenery, modular multi-show studios (Disney Hudson Square), election-night HQs, debate stages and special events. Art director on multiple Tony Awards broadcasts and part of the Emmy-winning team for the 65th Tony Awards.
